content: [{"type":"show","score":32.32948,"show":{"title":"Arrow","overview":"Oliver Queen and his father are lost at sea when their luxury yacht sinks. His father doesn't survive. Oliver survives on an uncharted island for five years learning to fight, but also learning about his father's corruption and unscrupulous business dealings. He returns to civilization a changed man, determined to put things right. He disguises himself with the hood of one of his mysterious island mentors, arms himself with a bow and sets about hunting down the men and women who have corrupted his city.","year":2012,"images":{"poster":{"full":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/shows/000/001/403/posters/original/defb148c55.jpg?1420875785","medium":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/shows/000/001/403/posters/medium/defb148c55.jpg?1420875785","thumb":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/shows/000/001/403/posters/thumb/defb148c55.jpg?1420875785"},"fanart":{"full":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/shows/000/001/403/fanarts/original/bbe10773b5.jpg?1420875786","medium":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/shows/000/001/403/fanarts/medium/bbe10773b5.jpg?1420875786","thumb":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/shows/000/001/403/fanarts/thumb/bbe10773b5.jpg?1420875786"}},"ids":{"trakt":1403,"slug":"arrow","tvdb":257655,"imdb":"tt2193021","tmdb":1412,"tvrage":30715}}},{"type":"show","score":22.630634,"show":{"title":"Broken Arrow","overview":"Indian Agent Tom Jeffords makes friends with Chief Cochise, becoming a blood brother of the Apache. ","year":1956,"images":{"poster":{"full":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/shows/000/013/810/posters/original/d0376036cb.jpg?1418992704","medium":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/shows/000/013/810/posters/medium/d0376036cb.jpg?1418992704","thumb":"https://walter.trakt.us/images/shows/000/013/810/posters/thumb/d0376036cb.jpg?1418992704"},"fanart":{"full":null,"medium":null,"thumb":null}},"ids":{"trakt":13810,"slug":"broken-arrow","tvdb":70767,"imdb":"tt0048848","tmdb":13870,"tvrage":87}}},{"type":"show","score":16.16474,"show":{"title":"Secret at Arrow Lake","overview":"Mia Williams, raised on the family Bed \u0026 Breakfast by Sara, a loving single mom grows up believing her father was lost, M.I.A., in the Gulf War. A tragic accident results in the sudden death of Sara and Mia finds herself alone to care for the B\u0026B while attending college. Daniel Williams, a hard-edged businessman from New York, arrives at the B\u0026B and Mia suspects he may be her lost father. The townsfolk believe he may be responsible for Sara's death. As events unfold, Daniel clears his name and finds acceptance from the community and Mia finds a father at last.","year":2013,"images":{"poster":{"full":null,"medium":null,"thumb":null},"fanart":{"full":null,"medium":null,"thumb":null}},"ids":{"trakt":74088,"slug":"secret-at-arrow-lake","tvdb":268859,"imdb":"tt1293093","tmdb":null,"tvrage":null}}},{"type":"show","score":16.16474,"show":{"title":"The Black Arrow","year":null,"images":{"poster":{"full":null,"medium":null,"thumb":null},"fanart":{"full":null,"medium":null,"thumb":null}},"ids":{"trakt":5694,"slug":"the-black-arrow","tvdb":268332,"imdb":"tt0485563","tmdb":5723,"tvrage":null}}},{"type":"show","score":16.16474,"show":{"title":"The Black Arrow","overview":"Action-adventure series based on the novel by Robert Louis Stevenson set during the Wars of the Roses.
